overview: Erin McCoy (Courtney Shay Young) and Rae Johnson (LaTasha Williams) travel deep into Central Louisiana site seeing when they soon become lost. The two are guided by a local merchant (William Hartley) to the town psychic (Rhonda Schaubert) for some unique local culture, but the visit turns dangerous immediately when they encounter the ZYDECO!
tagline: In the Deep South, outsiders are welcome... to die!
title: Zydeco
